item.title: Analysis: Bitcoin May Experience a Deeper Pullback if It Falls Below Short-Term Holder Cost of $106,000
item.description: On August 21st, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. put forward that Bitcoin is continuously withdrawing from its all-time high. The one-year MVRV Z-Score has declined to nearly neutral, currently being slightly below zero. This indicates that the unrealized profits on the network are somewhat compressed compared to the one-year average level, with a greater amount of supply at the breakeven point or in a loss-making state.The key support level of Bitcoin is at the short-term holder realized price of $106,000. If the price falls below $106,000, short-term holders will be in an overall loss, and the market will be at the risk of a more significant pullback.The recovery signal would be when the Z-Score continues to rise above zero and the price regains $118,000.

item.title: Binance Alpha: AriaAI (ARIA) Airdrop Claim Threshold 200 Points
item.description: August 21st, based on official information, Binance Alpha is set to list AriaAI (ARIA), and Alpha trading is scheduled to commence on August 21, 2025, at 20:00 (UTC+8). After the trading begins, users who hold at least 200 Binance Alpha Points can claim 625 ARIA tokens through an airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies. If the event is not yet completed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour. To claim the airdrop, it will cost 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the airdrop.

item.title: Websea has made significant progress in deepening its presence in the Japanese market, attracting attention from the industry.
item.description: On August 21st, the expansion of the cryptocurrency exchange platform Websea in the Japanese market has started to yield results. The user base is growing steadily and community engagement is continuously increasing, demonstrating its strong local market acceptance and growth potential. Japan is gradually emerging as a core engine in Websea's global strategy.This interim achievement has quickly drawn the attention of the industry. Many well-known Japanese crypto media outlets such as Cointelegraph Japan, Token Economist, and Crypto Times have all recognized Websea from the aspects of strategic deployment and ecosystem development, believing that it is injecting new innovative impetus into the local digital asset industry.As one of the world's most active cryptocurrency markets, Japan has a mature regulatory system and a large user base, which has laid a solid foundation for Websea's long-term development.

item.title: The Gold Token XAUm has officially landed on the Sui blockchain, and the Sui Foundation will include XAUm in its strategic reserves.
item.description: On August 20th, Matrixport's RWA tokenization platform, Matrixdock, announced that its gold token XAUm has successfully completed on-chain deployment on the Sui Network. This marks the first successful deployment of XAUm on a non-EVM compatible chain, signifying a significant milestone in XAUm's technical architecture and network support scalability. The Sui Foundation will also allocate a portion of its reserve assets to XAUm, demonstrating its support for the project through tangible actions and further highlighting the strategic position of tokenized gold in the on-chain asset portfolio of the Web3 era.XAUm is the first gold token asset on the RWA tokenization track of the Sui Network, providing the Sui community and traditional investors with a new avenue to participate in the gold market. With the completion of XAUm's on-chain deployment and full integration into the on-chain ecosystem, users in the Sui ecosystem can conveniently access XAUm and actively engage in on-chain ecosy

item.title: A Trader Bets Successively on Counterfeit and Authentic YZY, Losing Over $800,000
item.description: August 21st. Based on the on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), a trader used leverage on the genuine YZY coin at its highest point to break even. At one time, they saw a peak profit of $830,000 but did not realize it. Now, they are facing a floating loss of $106,000. Previously, the trader placed a bet on the fake Kanye concept meme coin YZY and suffered a loss of $700,000, resulting in a total cumulative loss of over $800,000.

item.title: 「Brother Big Brother」 Huang Licheng is 3x leveraged long on YZY, currently facing an unrealized loss of $41,000
item.description: On August 21, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng initiated a 3x leverage long position on YZY in the past hour. He held 570,000 tokens (approximately $642,000), with an entry price of $1.22 per token. Currently, he is facing an unrealized loss of $41,000.

item.title: Launchpad Platform Heaven Becomes Top Revenue Protocol in the Solana Ecosystem
item.description: On August 21st, based on defillama data, the Solana ecosystem's AMM and Launchpad platform Heaven achieved a protocol revenue of $1.02 million within the past 24 hours. This placed it as the third-largest fee-generating protocol on Solana, trailing only behind pump.fun and Axiom Pro.

item.title: A certain whale/institution continues to sell 400 WBTC to receive 10,493 ETH
item.description: On August 21st, according to the monitoring of the Ember Group, a whale/institution has once more transferred 400 WBTC to Hyperliquid within the past 3 hours for the purpose of selling and exchanging it for 10,493 ETH (approximately $45.11 million).

item.title: AKEDO has released the AKE Claim Rules, covering both Mini App and platform users
item.description: August 21st. According to official channels, AKEDO has declared the commencement of AKE token claiming. Mini App users can verify and claim the token on the TGE Airdrop page starting from 20:00 (Beijing time) on this day. Users who make the first claim can also obtain an additional 5% AKE point reward. Points can be queried at any time on the claiming website by linking the same wallet.Platform users can exchange at a ratio of 1200 AKE points for 1 AKE, with a minimum exchange threshold of 330,000 AKE points. Users are required to keep 30,000 points non-exchangeable and also need to pay the Gas fee on the BNB Chain. In case of exchange failure, users can refresh and try again after 15 minutes.It was previously reported that Binance Wallet will hold an exclusive TGE event for AKEDO (AKE) from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM (UTC) on August 21, 2025.

item.title: Binance has become a founding member of the Beacon Network, helping to combat cryptocurrency crime in real time
item.description: On August 21st, Binance announced that it became a founding member of the Beacon Network and joined the world's first real-time cryptocurrency crime-fighting network. The network, developed by TRM Labs, collaborates with leading companies in the crypto industry and law enforcement agencies to prevent illegal funds from leaving the blockchain through real-time intelligence sharing and cooperation. As the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange platform, Binance's participation will enhance the security of the crypto ecosystem and promote the long-term growth and adoption of crypto assets.Binance's Global Chief Compliance Officer, Noah Perlman, said: "It has been demonstrated that blockchain is one of the most powerful tools for combating financial crime. The Beacon Network further promotes the collaboration between the public and private sectors to ensure that we continue to reduce crime on the blockchain."
